article: An eight-year-old child heard her parents talking about her little brother. All she knew was that he was very sick and they had no money left. When she heard her daddy say to her  _  mother with whispered desperation , "  Only  can save him now", the little girl went to her bedroom and took out her piggy bank. She  _  all the change out on the floor and counted it carefully. Then she  _  her way six blocks to the local drugstore . "And what do you want?" asked the chemist. His name is Andrew and he has something  _  growing inside his head and my daddy says only a miracle can save him."
